net.sf.freecol.client.gui

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.freecol.client.gui.GUI

  • public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper for the overall GUI.

      • colonyTileGUI

        private MapViewer colonyTileGUI

      • getChoice

        public <T> T getChoice(boolean modal,
                       Tile tile,
                       java.lang.Object explain,
                       java.lang.Object obj,
                       java.lang.String cancelKey,
                       java.util.List<ChoiceItem<T>> choices)
        General choice dialog.
        Parameters:
        modal - Is this a modal dialog?
        tile - An optional Tile to expose.
        explain - An object explaining the choice.
        obj - An optional object to make an icon for the dialog with.
        cancelKey - A key for the "cancel" button.
        choices - A list a ChoiceItems to choose from.
        Returns:
        The selected value of the selected ChoiceItem, or null if cancelled.
